title: Set alias for columns in data set but expression builder still shows old column names when selecting the dataset
description: Upon setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the expression builder continues to display the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the newly set aliases.
EB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the aliases set for the columns should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset.
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. Verify that the old column names are displayed instead of the set aliases.
